full_summary:
===============

### Request for Proposal: Isilon Support and Maintenance Renewal

#### Solicitation Details

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | SSC-22-00021237:T |
| Solicitation Number | BPM017730/21237 |
| Publication Date | December 21, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | January 17, 2023, 14:00:00 |

#### Notice Details

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Notice Type | Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions) |
| Procurement Category | SRVTGD (Services commercial) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner) |

#### Description of Goods and Services

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites bids for the Isilon Support and Maintenance Renewal, from January 29, 2023 to January 28, 2024. Bidders must submit their bids electronically through the SSC P2P portal.

#### Eligibility Requirements

*   The bid must be submitted through the SSC P2P portal by the tender closing date and time.
*   Bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal in order to submit a response to a solicitation and receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations.

#### Specifications

*   Bids must be submitted electronically through the SSC P2P portal.
*   SSC will not accept paper or faxed bids.

#### Contact Information

*   Sandra Ladouceur
*   Phone: 613-302-0766
*   Email: [sandra.ladouceur2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:sandra.ladouceur2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
*   Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3, Canada

#### Attachment

The attached document (https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/6EBC781B-7AC7-478F-988E-CA17A0D09CCA) provides additional details on the solicitation and requirements.
